remarks: Multiplication of infinite sums.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 18-Dec-2017.)
statement:
iprodmul.1 $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
iprodmul.2 $e |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) $.
iprodmul.3 $e |- ( ph -> E. n e. Z E. y ( y =/= 0 /\ seq n ( x. , F ) ~~> y ) ) $.
iprodmul.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) = A ) $.
iprodmul.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> A e. CC ) $.
iprodmul.6 $e |- ( ph -> E. m e. Z E. z ( z =/= 0 /\ seq m ( x. , G ) ~~> z ) ) $.
iprodmul.7 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( G ` k ) = B ) $.
iprodmul.8 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> B e. CC ) $.
iprodmul $p |- ( ph -> prod_ k e. Z ( A x. B ) = ( prod_ k e. Z A x. prod_ k e. Z B ) ) $.
$d A n y $.
$d B m $.
$d B m z $.
$d F k $.
$d F k m $.
$d F k m n y z $.
$d G k $.
$d G k m $.
$d G k m n y z $.
$d M k $.
$d M k m $.
$d M k m n y z $.
$d Z k m $.
$d Z k m n y z $.
$d k m ph $.
$d n ph y z $.
